name: LetterSoul
description:
In Lettersoul, you play the role of a letterman in charge of giving some letters, one of those is a little bit special.. It is given you by the king, it is a war declaration.

In your trip you may or may not use the power of the feelings

(not finished  at all)

Risu Niku - Game Art, Animation

Narudgi - Game Design, Programming
